text: Nɨbɨlaŋ 1.18 1 Ti 4.1, 2 Ti 3.1, 2 Pi 2.1, 3.3 nɨman abavɨmalɨ uamalɨ. Fi uaiaŋ susu acaba acaba agɨlaŋ sɨvɨla sɨvɨla mɨkiŋ micɨ hɨvɨ abacuvacuva hɨsɨŋ kulaŋ agɨlaŋ iakɨbalɨhavi aba abavɨmalɨ uamalɨ. Nɨbɨlaŋ iaka Asɨ dɨ kuligalagalaŋ nulɨdɨ nuken hɨji sɨbɨlɨ sɨbɨlɨ agɨladɨ lɨbiakɨlavɨdɨ aba abavɨmalɨ uamalɨ.
